actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Eugene L. Vickery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release to a certain individual a narwhale tusk cane seized by agents of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service. Exempts such individual from prosecution under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 with respect to such cane.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Eugene L. Vickery.
